messages.text: Hey team, PR-145 is ready for review! Added exponential backoff for payment API retries with comprehensive tests. cc <@U02BOB> <@U01ALICE>
Quick bump on PR-145 - has been waiting 24hrs now. PAY-102 is blocking PAY-103 and PAY-105. <@U02BOB> when you get a chance?
Sorry team, deep in the PAY-108 incident - duplicate charges are affecting prod. Will get to reviews ASAP.
No worries! PR-145 now at 48 hours though - getting worried about sprint deadline. Can <@U01ALICE> help with review?
I can take a look but I'm not super familiar with the retry logic architecture. <@U02BOB> should really be the main reviewer here.

🚨 CRITICAL: Duplicate charge detected in production
• Order ID: ORD-9847362
• Amount: $234.99
• Customer charged twice
• Created PAY-108
On it - root cause identified as race condition in payment processor. PR-148 incoming.
PR-148 approved from my side. Ready for deployment once DevOps signs off.

📋 Daily Standup Summary - Sprint 10 Day 9

✅ Done:
• Alice: Webhook handlers merged (PAY-101)

🚧 In Progress:
• David: Retry logic in review (PAY-102, PR-145) - BLOCKED 52hrs
• David: Dashboard at 40% (PAY-104)
• Bob: Fixing critical bug (PAY-108)

🚫 Blockers:
• PAY-102 blocking PAY-103, PAY-105
• Review bottleneck - Bob handling incident
Sprint velocity at risk - only 29% complete with 3 days left. PAY-102 is the critical path.
PAY-105 (load testing) can't start until PAY-102 is merged. We need that this sprint.

📋 Daily Standup Summary - Sprint 10 Day 8

✅ Done:
• Alice: Webhook handlers merged (PAY-101)

🚧 In Progress:
• David: Retry logic PR ready (PAY-102, PR-145)
• David: Starting dashboard work (PAY-104)

🚫 Blockers:
• Waiting on PR-145 review

direct_messages.text: Hey Bob, I know you're swamped with PAY-108, but PR-145 has been waiting 2+ days now and it's blocking 2 other stories. Can we get Alice to review or should we escalate?
I'll try to squeeze it in today. The duplicate charge bug was critical - had to prioritize. Alice isn't familiar enough with the retry architecture to be the primary reviewer.
